page.title: 02THE TWO SIDES OF THE CART
page.content: The River Cart was once the boundary between the counties of Renfrewshire (west-bank) and Lanarkshire(east-bank) It is still the Local Government boundary between{Eastwood District (west) and{East Kilbride District (east).Both Districts are part of the larger{Strathclyde Region. The Districts and Region have their elected councils.The Districts are responsible for housing,recreation, environmental health and local planning.The Region is responsible for education,social work,transport and regional planning. Organisations such as{community {councils}made up of people concerned with local issues are separate.Busby and Clarkston community council in Eastwood and Cartvale community council in East Kilbride District. This makes Busby a"two sided" village.
